org.wise.portal.presentation.web.controllers.teacher

Class TeacherAccountController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wise.portal.presentation.web.controllers.teacher.TeacherAccountController

  • @Controller
 @SessionAttributes(value="teacherAccountForm")
public class TeacherAccountController
extends Object
    Controller for creating and updating WISE teacher accounts
    Author:
    Hiroki Terashima

      • initializeFormNewTeacher

        @RequestMapping(value="/teacher/join",
                method=GET)
public String initializeFormNewTeacher(org.springframework.ui.ModelMap modelMap)
                                                                                                   throws Exception
        Called before the page is loaded to initialize values. Adds the TeacherAccountForm object to the model. This object will be filled out and submitted for creating the new teacher
        Parameters:
        modelMap - the model object that contains values for the page to use when rendering the view
        Returns:
        the path of the view to display
        Throws:
        Exception

      • onSubmit

        @RequestMapping(value={"/teacher/join","/teacher/management/updatemyaccountinfo.html"},
                method=POST)
protected String onSubmit(@ModelAttribute(value="teacherAccountForm")
                                                                                                                                               TeacherAccountForm accountForm,
                                                                                                                                               org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult,
                                                                                                                                               javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                                                                                               org.springframework.ui.ModelMap modelMap)
        On submission of the signup form, a user is created and saved to the data store.
        Parameters:
        accountForm - the model object that contains values for the page to use when rendering the view
        bindingResult - the object used for validation in which errors will be stored
        request - the http request object
        modelMap - the object that contains values to be displayed on the page
        Returns:
        the path of the view to display
